def get_metadata(db_name, table_name):
    df = spark.sql(f"DESCRIBE FORMATTED {db_name}.{table_name}")

    # Convert to dictionary
    metadata = (
        df.filter(df.col_name.isin("Type", "Provider", "Location"))
        .rdd.map(lambda row: (row["col_name"], row["data_type"]))
        .collectAsMap()
    )

    return {
        "type": metadata.get("Type"),
        "format": metadata.get("Provider"),
        "location": metadata.get("Location"),
        "db_name": db_name,
        "table_name": table_name
